snippet: Marissa Mayer’s plan to spin off Yahoo’s $34 billion stake in Alibaba tax-free could run into resistance from federal tax authorities.
abstract: IRS signals that it is weighing potential changes in how it treats some classes of tax-free spinoffs, particularly those in which operating business comprises only small portion of new company; change could have serious consequences for Yahoo's plan to spin off its $34 billion stake in Alibaba tax-free.

byline.original: By VINDU GOEL and MICHAEL J. de la MERCED

lead_paragraph: Marissa Mayer’s plan to spin off Yahoo’s $34 billion stake in Alibaba tax-free could run into resistance from federal tax authorities.

headline.main: I.R.S. Look at Spinoffs May Affect Yahoo Plan
headline.print_headline: I.R.S. Look at Spinoffs May Affect Yahoo Plan
